About Me

Here is some more about me

University Of Plymouth

Coding:-

Learnt a variety of programming languages which includes C#, C++, Java, Python, VB, VB.net, PHP, HTML, XML, XAML.

Design:-

Learnt how to design apps using Visual Studio and NetBeans. Conducted usability testing to ensure UI was easy to use and intuitive.

Data:-

Created and manipulated data using SQL commands in SQL developer and Oracle Application Express. Used normalization and requirements analysis techniques to create efficient database structures. Learned about data mining techniques, their importance within retail as well as potential problems that may occur.

Project Management:-

Learnt about Agile, PRINCE2 and Scrum frameworks. Used GitHub and Bitbucket to collaborate work. Used pivotal tracker and scrum framework to track progress within group projects.

Prime8 Project
